p: The EZ-IO® tea trolley was used to train a mixture of 36 consultants, juniors, nurses and ODPs. 97 % reported an increase in their confidence using the EZ-IO® system and 100 % found the ‘tea trolley’ a useful teaching method (mean Linkert 4.9, 5 = most useful). Following training 100 % of participants were correctly able to identify the locations of EZ-IO® devices for their clinical areas and identify the correct anatomical sites for IO insertion.
